fixes.name: BATCH
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR numerator = ABS( SUM( 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)] ) )
VAR denominator = CALCULATE( ABS( SUM( 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)] ) ), ALL( 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)' ) )
RETURN DIVIDE( numerator, denominator )
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the Tableau expression [Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs] / TOTAL([Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs]) into DAX. The per-context value is ABS(SUM(...)) (as provided by the calculated field mapping). The TOTAL table calculation is implemented using CALCULATE(..., ALL(Table)) to get the table-level total. DIVIDE is used to safely perform the division. All column references were converted to 'Table'[Column] format.
